entry.content:
Poetry is an invited guest, a legacy of thought, An irrepressible Wish that further drives Us forth on this flight across certain thresholds, No stone unturned until levity is restored. Beyond the exactness is trust, the intuition alive.
Accompany me into this world; Back inside, would you cling to this premise?

“Poetry”

  • Marianne Moore

I too, dislike it: there are things that are more important than honesty. But no one looks at it that way; The best thing is to keep away from it altogether.

“Poetry”

  • Marianne Moore
